feed.title: Flood Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Flood: Release v4.8.1
entry.content:
4.8.1 (May 4, 2024)

  • feat: new args --disable-rate-limit to disable rate limit on api except login (#737)
  • fix: only generate mediainfo for video file (#741)
  • fix: /metainfo json response for error (#740)

entry.title: New release for Flood: Release v4.8.2
entry.content: nothing new, just a new release to for deb files.

entry.title: New release for Flood: Release v4.8.3
New release for Flood: Release v4.8.4
entry.content:
bump: 4.8.4 (#811)

What's Changed

  • fix: add_paused changed to add_stopped in qbit 5 by @whiteout12 in https://github.com/jesec/flood/pull/810
  • bump: 4.8.4 by @trim21 in https://github.com/jesec/flood/pull/811

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jesec/flood/compare/v4.8.3...v4.8.4

entry.title: New release for Flood: Release v4.8.5
entry.content:
release: 4.8.5 (#832)

What's Changed

  • build(deps): bump http-proxy-middleware from 2.0.6 to 2.0.7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jesec/flood/pull/816
  • fix(qBittorrent): Missing states by @LXGaming in https://github.com/jesec/flood/pull/817
  • i18n: new translations by @trim21 in https://github.com/jesec/flood/pull/821
  • ci: fix docker-dbg job by @trim21 in https://github.com/jesec/flood/pull/822
  • build(deps): bump cross-spawn from 7.0.3 to 7.0.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jesec/flood/pull/823
  • fix(qBittorrent): API Version state handling by @LXGaming in https://github.com/jesec/flood/pull/826
  • fix(rTorrent): prevent extra commas in serialized XML by @kannibalox in https://github.com/jesec/flood/pull/830
  • fix(rTorrent): support xmlrpc int type by @trim21 in https://github.com/jesec/flood/pull/829
  • build: remove deprecated package frontmatter-markdown-loader by @trim21 in https://github.com/jesec/flood/pull/831
  • release: 4.8.5 by @trim21 in https://github.com/jesec/flood/pull/832

New Contributors

  • @kannibalox made their first contribution in https://github.com/jesec/flood/pull/830

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jesec/flood/compare/v4.8.4...v4.8.5
